meanings.sent1: The foreknown outcome of the experiment was already predicted.
meanings.sent2: It was foreknown that the storm would hit the coast.
meanings.sent3: The foreknown surprise party was almost ruined by the early arrival of the guest of honor.
meanings.sent4: Her foreknown success in the competition made her a favorite among the participants.
meanings.sent5: The foreknown consequences of his actions weighed heavily on his mind.

meanings.sent1: With foreknown information, she was able to prepare for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The foreknown details of the plan helped them avoid any surprises.
meanings.sent3: His foreknown ability to fix things made him the go-to person in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The foreknown presence of the inspector made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent5: The foreknown location of the treasure map led them to a hidden cave.

meanings.sent1: Their meeting seemed foreknown, as if it was meant to happen.
meanings.sent2: The foreknown prophecy came true, just as it was foretold.
meanings.sent3: The foreknown destiny of the hero was revealed in the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent4: Her foreknown role in the play made her practice even harder.
meanings.sent5: The foreknown path to success was filled with challenges and obstacles.
